Job DescriptionWorld-class customer service is one of the cornerstones of Wolt 💙 Over the years we have invested a lot in our in-house built support tooling as we believe that it’s the only way we can ensure satisfaction for all of our customers and partners in each of the 23 countries that we operate in. We take huge pride in our customer operations’ quality, so on top of building delightful support experiences in our consumer app we also want to proactively identify and solve issues even before our customers and partners even notice something might be wrong.To make sure that our more than 20M+ monthly users are able to get help as quickly as possible, we have a team that is building a self-service support platform. The platform will allow us to design self-service flows with a no-code solution and then deploy them into the hands of customers in a matter of minutes.We work with high ownership in small teams where each team member works around the whole software development life cycle. Each and every one of our product team members have a say in where we are going and what solutions we implement. Being a member of the team, you’ll collaborate closely with the designer, product manager, and other engineers in your team.📍This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Berlin, or Stockholm, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, Germany, Denmark, and Estonia. Read more about our remote setup here. If you live outside of these countries - do not worry! We provide relocation support to help you make your way to Finland, Germany, or Sweden.Our humble expectationsYou might be the one if you are an engineer with experience in designing and building top-class software and APIs, and enthusiasm toward working with Python is naturally essential. We mostly work with Python (FastAPI & Flask), MongoDB, and PostgreSQL, and appreciate it if you understand what it takes to build and operate scalable software services in production. Our massive backend is powered with Kubernetes in AWS so proficiency in these platforms or similar cloud infrastructure is a huge plus.Aside from technology, we expect you to be a product-oriented problem solver, a good communicator, willing to collaborate with people in and outside of your own team, and keen to bring up issues in a constructive manner to the team and to Wolt at large.Next StepsThe position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Salem Mansuri (salem.mansuri@external.wolt.com)About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.Do you have a passion to help customers to become more data centric in a manner more holistic than just implementing some new tool? Then this is the role for you!We are looking for a Senior Data Consultant / Advisor who wants to be part of Tietoevry Tech Services.Tietoevry Tech Services drives IT landscape modernization and digital & data transformation across business, IT & data organizations at large Nordic companies. Data & AI is one of the fastest growing service areas in Tietoevry Tech Services dedicated to being client’s first choice partner in their data driven transformation. Our hearts are beating for data, business, and human union. We are passionate about making data flow in our customer’s organization and create business value with it!When joining Tietoevry Tech Services as a Senior Data Consultant / Advisor: You will be a part of a team of talented, forward-looking, and self-driven experts who are passionate to help our customers to succeed in becoming more data driven and to take their data management to the next level.You will focus more on improving data management capabilities, processes and change management and the meaning of data than solely on technology/applications, even if we find fit-for-purpose tools and using modern techniques as critical success factors.You could play a key role in facilitating the creation and execution of data strategies and business case by designing and implementing data governance operating model, defining data models and ontologies, documenting data by using metadata/data catalogs, or implementing data quality measurement processes.You will be instrumental to drive change, raising data awareness by individual and team coaching as well as training will play an important role in helping our customers to succeed with their data management journey.To rock this position You have a passion for all things data!You have a strong understanding of overall data management concepts and deeper content expertise in one or more relevant data management areas.You are an experienced (5+ years) data professional with several years of experience explicitly in the field or context of data management, and with previous leadership experience leading for instance data management projects, teams, and/or solutions.You take a consultative and "sales" approach, with the ability to interact and work with clients to understand their needs and adapt to their unique situations. With strong networking and social skills, you can drive or support sales and coordinate team efforts.You have excellent written and oral communication skills in English.You have a Bachelor's, or ideally Master's, degree in a relevant field. We also appreciateExperience in financial or public sectors, including data-related laws and regulations, or manufacturing industry.An interest in or prior experience of data management in the ESG context.Previous consulting experience and agile ways of working.Working proficiency in one or more Nordic languages.What’s in it for you?We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, open culture, and an outstanding work-life balance! We offer you and opportunity to create the future of a growing and fast developing and important sector. We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.Join us and make your mark!We look forward to your application!Please attach your CV or LinkedIn-profile and we’ll reach out to you. Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact hiring manager Thomas Kirk, via e-mail thomas.kirk@tietoevry.com.Hope to hear from you soon!Tietoevry thrives with diversity, and we welcome applicants of all genders, ages, abilities, ethnicities, orientations, beliefs, and backgrounds.About TietoevryTietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs.Creating purposeful technology to reinvent the world for good!

You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.Do you have a passion to help customers to become more data centric in a manner more holistic than just implementing some new tool? Then this is the role for you!We are looking for a Senior Data Consultant / Advisor who wants to be part of Tietoevry Tech Services.Tietoevry Tech Services drives IT landscape modernization and digital & data transformation across business, IT & data organizations at large Nordic companies. Data & AI is one of the fastest growing service areas in Tietoevry Tech Services dedicated to being client’s first choice partner in their data driven transformation. Our hearts are beating for data, business, and human union. We are passionate about making data flow in our customer’s organization and create business value with it!When joining Tietoevry Tech Services as a Senior Data Consultant / Advisor: You will be a part of a team of talented, forward-looking, and self-driven experts who are passionate to help our customers to succeed in becoming more data driven and to take their data management to the next level.You will focus more on improving data management capabilities, processes and change management and the meaning of data than solely on technology/applications, even if we find fit-for-purpose tools and using modern techniques as critical success factors.You could play a key role in facilitating the creation and execution of data strategies and business case by designing and implementing data governance operating model, defining data models and ontologies, documenting data by using metadata/data catalogs, or implementing data quality measurement processes.You will be instrumental to drive change, raising data awareness by individual and team coaching as well as training will play an important role in helping our customers to succeed with their data management journey.To rock this position You have a passion for all things data!You have a strong understanding of overall data management concepts and deeper content expertise in one or more relevant data management areas.You are an experienced (5+ years) data professional with several years of experience explicitly in the field or context of data management, and with previous leadership experience leading for instance data management projects, teams, and/or solutions.You take a consultative and "sales" approach, with the ability to interact and work with clients to understand their needs and adapt to their unique situations. With strong networking and social skills, you can drive or support sales and coordinate team efforts.You have excellent written and oral communication skills in English.You have a Bachelor's, or ideally Master's, degree in a relevant field. We also appreciateExperience in financial or public sectors, including data-related laws and regulations, or manufacturing industry.An interest in or prior experience of data management in the ESG context.Previous consulting experience and agile ways of working.Working proficiency in one or more Nordic languages.What’s in it for you?We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, open culture, and an outstanding work-life balance! We offer you and opportunity to create the future of a growing and fast developing and important sector. We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.Join us and make your mark!We look forward to your application!Please attach your CV or LinkedIn-profile and we’ll reach out to you. Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today. You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.About Tietoevry CareTietoevry Care is modernizing the Nordic health and social care sector with modular, open, and interoperable software. We develop and deliver high quality software solutions and services that enable healthcare and welfare professionals to do their work even better and with higher efficiency - have more time to care.We are a global team of professionals working on providing products and services to different sectors from intensive care to laboratory and social care. In addition to working closely with our customers, we also have our own products that we build and develop for various fields in society. From enabling healthcare professionals to spend more valuable time with their patients to providing data for professional athletes to achieve even better results, we make all that possible. With us you can build technology for the good of society and make your mark on the health and wellbeing of people in need.About The PositionWe are looking for Application Specialist to our Health-unit Customer Support team, working with the Healthcare products.In our team you will work as a member of a group of application specialists. Our activities are directed to supporting the customers of healthcare systems and they also include consulting, deployment & configuration, as well as consulting regarding the implementation of our Healthcare products. In this role you'll have opportunities to participate in creating new IT solutions, services and products. You'll also get to directly participate in the full implementation lifecycle.To rock this positionExperience with Microsoft SQL Server and SQLFluent Finnish and good English language skillsKnowledge of national requirements regarding healthcare, integrations used in healthcare sector, data communications, ITIL, and Lifecare applications will be counted as an advantage. You might have been working as a main-user in a healthcare organization. We also appreciate experience and deep understanding of IT services and solutions in the healthcare domain and proven skills on working in the Healthcare sector, providing support for the Healthcare specialistsWhat’s in it for you?With us you will be part of the important and meaningful work of developing healthcare for all of us. You have an important mission to make a difference that really matters. In addition, as a company we offer you professional growth, open and friendly culture, and an outstanding work-life balance! We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful.We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle. We want to encourage you to keep up that curiosity and deepen your knowledge on topics you’re interested in. For example, we host a ‘Keep Learning Week’ twice a year, a week where everyone at Tietoevry has the possibility to join different training courses in a truly global setting.We also offer you Empowerment, flexibility and work-life balance Numerous networking opportunities and internal communitiesVarious opportunities both to learn and to share knowledge with othersInternal career and development opportunitiesWe learn and grow everyday and are truly motivated to help the healthcare sector!You'll enjoy working with us especially if as a person you are proactive, self-driven and service-minded in your work and delivering superior customer value is a top priority for you. In addition, you are self-motivated and have the confidence to take on full client responsibility. This allows you to reach your highest potential with us. To value accountability highly in yourself and in others is important as we work as a team, often in challenging tasks where each and everyone's effort is equally important. You have flexible and responsible personality with positive attitude and willingness to learn more.Join us in building a brighter future!We look forward to hearing from you! Please send us your application by 21st of May. You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.About Tietoevry CareTietoevry Care is modernizing the Nordic health and social care sector with modular, open, and interoperable software. We develop and deliver high quality software solutions and services that enable healthcare and welfare professionals to do their work even better and with higher efficiency - have more time to care.We are a global team of professionals working on providing products and services to different sectors from intensive care to laboratory and social care. In addition to working closely with our customers, we also have our own products that we build and develop for various fields in society. From enabling healthcare professionals to spend more valuable time with their patients to providing data for professional athletes to achieve even better results, we make all that possible. With us you can build technology for the good of society and make your mark on the health and wellbeing of people in need.About The PositionWe are looking for Application Specialist to our Health-unit Customer Support team, working with the Healthcare products.In our team you will work as a member of a group of application specialists. Our activities are directed to supporting the customers of healthcare systems and they also include consulting, deployment & configuration, as well as consulting regarding the implementation of our Healthcare products. In this role you'll have opportunities to participate in creating new IT solutions, services and products. You'll also get to directly participate in the full implementation lifecycle.To rock this positionExperience with Microsoft SQL Server and SQLFluent Finnish and good English language skillsKnowledge of national requirements regarding healthcare, integrations used in healthcare sector, data communications, ITIL, and Lifecare applications will be counted as an advantage. You might have been working as a main-user in a healthcare organization. We also appreciate experience and deep understanding of IT services and solutions in the healthcare domain and proven skills on working in the Healthcare sector, providing support for the Healthcare specialistsWhat’s in it for you?With us you will be part of the important and meaningful work of developing healthcare for all of us. You have an important mission to make a difference that really matters. In addition, as a company we offer you professional growth, open and friendly culture, and an outstanding work-life balance! We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful.We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle. We want to encourage you to keep up that curiosity and deepen your knowledge on topics you’re interested in. For example, we host a ‘Keep Learning Week’ twice a year, a week where everyone at Tietoevry has the possibility to join different training courses in a truly global setting.We also offer you Empowerment, flexibility and work-life balance Numerous networking opportunities and internal communitiesVarious opportunities both to learn and to share knowledge with othersInternal career and development opportunitiesWe learn and grow everyday and are truly motivated to help the healthcare sector!You'll enjoy working with us especially if as a person you are proactive, self-driven and service-minded in your work and delivering superior customer value is a top priority for you. In addition, you are self-motivated and have the confidence to take on full client responsibility. This allows you to reach your highest potential with us. To value accountability highly in yourself and in others is important as we work as a team, often in challenging tasks where each and everyone's effort is equally important. You have flexible and responsible personality with positive attitude and willingness to learn more.Join us in building a brighter future!We look forward to hearing from you! Please send us your application by 21st of May. We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.Join us and make your mark!We look forward to your application!Please attach your CV or LinkedIn-profile and we’ll reach out to you. Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact hiring manager Thomas Kirk, via e-mail thomas.kirk@tietoevry.com.Hope to hear from you soon!Tietoevry thrives with diversity, and we welcome applicants of all genders, ages, abilities, ethnicities, orientations, beliefs, and backgrounds.About TietoevryTietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We develop and deliver high quality software solutions and services that enable healthcare and welfare professionals to do their work even better and with higher efficiency - have more time to care.We are a global team of professionals working on providing products and services to different sectors from intensive care to laboratory and social care. In addition to working closely with our customers, we also have our own products that we build and develop for various fields in society. From enabling healthcare professionals to spend more valuable time with their patients to providing data for professional athletes to achieve even better results, we make all that possible. With us you can build technology for the good of society and make your mark on the health and wellbeing of people in needAbout The PositionWe are looking for Application Specialist to our Health-unit Customer Support team, working with the Healthcare products.In our team you will work as a member of a group of application specialists. Our activities are directed to supporting the customers of healthcare systems and they also include consulting, deployment & configuration, as well as consulting regarding the implementation of our Healthcare products. In this role you'll have opportunities to participate in creating new IT solutions, services and products. You'll also get to directly participate in the full implementation lifecycle.To rock this positionExperience with Microsoft SQL Server and SQLFluent Finnish and good English language skillsKnowledge of national requirements regarding healthcare, integrations used in healthcare sector, data communications, ITIL, and Lifecare applications will be counted as an advantage. You might have been working as a main-user in a healthcare organization. We also appreciate experience and deep understanding of IT services and solutions in the healthcare domain and proven skills on working in the Healthcare sector, providing support for the Healthcare specialists.What’s in it for you?With us you will be part of the important and meaningful work of developing healthcare for all of us. You have an important mission to make a difference that really matters. In addition, as a company we offer you professional growth, open and friendly culture, and an outstanding work-life balance! We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful.We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle. We want to encourage you to keep up that curiosity and deepen your knowledge on topics you’re interested in. For example, we host a ‘Keep Learning Week’ twice a year, a week where everyone at Tietoevry has the possibility to join different training courses in a truly global setting.We also offer you Empowerment, flexibility and work-life balance Numerous networking opportunities and internal communitiesVarious opportunities both to learn and to share knowledge with othersInternal career and development opportunitiesWe learn and grow everyday and are truly motivated to help the healthcare sector!You'll enjoy working with us especially if as a person you are proactive, self-driven and service-minded in your work and delivering superior customer value is a top priority for you. In addition, you are self-motivated and have the confidence to take on full client responsibility. This allows you to reach your highest potential with us. To value accountability highly in yourself and in others is important as we work as a team, often in challenging tasks where each and everyone's effort is equally important. You have flexible and responsible personality with positive attitude and willingness to learn more.Join us in building a brighter future!We look forward to hearing from you! You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.Hyppää Tietoevryn testaustiimiin!Haluatko tulla mukaan kehittämään kaikkien suomalaisten käyttämiä palveluita? Tietoevry tekee testausta ja laadunvarmistusta yli 50 asiakkaalle Suomessa ja kysyntä kasvaa jatkuvasti.Toivotammekin nyt sinut, testiautomaatiokehittäjä, tervetulleeksi mukaan tiimiimme!Oletko valmis vaikuttamaan?Työskentelemme monella eri toimialalla – esimerkiksi pankki-, vakuutus- ja metsäalalla, julkishallinnossa, kaupan ja logistiikan alalla, sekä tele- ja media-alalla. Olemme muun muassa digitalisoineet Suomen viisumipalvelun, mukana uudistamassa Väyläviraston ratatietojärjestelmiä ja luoneet ratkaisun asiakaskeskeiseen sote-digitalisaatioon. Tulevaisuudessa pääset kehittämään kanssamme jopa vielä merkittävämpiä hankkeita.Suomessa kollegoinasi työskentelee yli 300 testauksen ammattilaista ja yli 100 testiautomaatioammattilaista. Maailmanlaajuisesti testaajakollegoita on yli 1000 joista testiautomaatioammattilaisia yli 300 - aina löytyy kaveri sparrailemaan parhaista käytännöistä. Pääset myös kartuttamaan kokemusta vaihtamatta organisaatiota, vaikka sinulta löytyisi jo kilometrejä testiautomaation parissa.Työssäsi pääset mm. seuraavantyyppisiin tehtäviin: Asiakastarpeiden ja testiautomaatioratkaisujen analysointi Proof-of-Concept-testiautomaatiohankkeiden suunnittelu, esittely ja rakentaminen Testiautomaatioratkaisujen rakentaminen, ylläpito ja käyttö asiakasprojekteissa Sisäinen ja ulkoinen mentorointi, koulutuksien järjestäminen Jatkuva analyysi ja arviointi testiautomaation uusista työkaluista, toimintatavoista ja innovaatioistaTässä roolissa sinulla tulee olla käytännön projektikokemusta seuraavista: Kokemusta monipuolisista testiautomaatioratkaisujen neuvonta- ja suunnittelutehtävistä, mieluiten useilla työkaluilla (esim. Robot Framework, Selenium, Cypress, UFT) Kokemusta ketterän ohjelmistokehityksen ja DevOpsin käytännöistä Kykyä työskennellä sekä suomeksi että englanniksiCI-työkalut, kontitus, tietokannat (SQL), koodaaminen (Java tai Python) ja tutkiva testaus.Koska työskentelet toimeksiannoissa asiakkaan kanssa, uskomme, että olet sosiaalinen ja omaat erinomaiset kommunikaatiotaidot. Osaat yksinkertaistaa tekniset ratkaisut asiakkaalle, etkä pelkää tarvittaessa haastaa näkemyksiä. Haluat työskennellä reippaasti etenevissä ja toisinaan nopeastikin muuttuvissa projekteissa. Uskomme avoimuuteen, monimuotoisuuteen ja itsenäiseen ajatteluun, sekä yhdessä tekemiseen - toivottavasti sinäkin!Buzzwords: Testiautomaatio, DevOps, Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift, Robot Framework, Python, Java, tutkiva testausInnostuitko?Kuulemme mielellämme sinusta! Lähetä yhteystietosi oheisen linkin kautta niin otamme yhteyttä! Silo AI is the leading AI service company in the Nordics. We've grown fast and are currently a team of 230+ tech and business professionals globally. We work together with our clients to create the next step of AI for their needs. At Silo AI engineers and scientists collaborate closely to tackle challenging real-world problems. The core competence of Silo AI relies on deep academic expertise in various fields of AI, covering machine learning, natural-language processing, computer vision among others. AI Scientists are expected to build innovative AI solutions that together with engineers and system developers can be deployed as real-time solutions to provide customer value.What will you be doingAs an AI Scientist in Machine Learning, you'll work in a top tier team of AI experts, solving real-life cases using the latest Machine Learning techniques. You'll closely collaborate with an engineering team to bring models into toolkits, and business developers to impress the client. You may choose to work from our offices, whichever suits you best.Get to know your future colleagues AI Scientist Emil & AI Scientist Luiza.AI Scientists are expected to have strong publications or projects showing clear evidence of high-quality research and innovation in fields directly related to AI and proven experience and ability to implement high-performance AI solutions:Analyze data to discover patterns, find opportunities, and develop and apply innovative algorithms. Validate new or improved models via statistically relevant experiments. Work closely with AI engineers to build scalable prototypes for testing, and integrate successful models and algorithms in production systems. Support in identifying opportunities in creating customer value with AI. Advance exploratory research projects in machine learning and related fields to create highly innovative customer experiences. Read more about our projects with Finnair in flight delay prediction, with Ramboll in water quality predictions and with Awake.AI in developing smart ports and smart vessels.Our cultureWhat we believe in at SiloBuild Bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and always seek to understand how we can best help them, and make sure that we keep what we promise. We encourage a culture where successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Keep Learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and attracting talent with a growth mindset. We believe that expertise is not an achievement - it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing and working with people who share the same hunger. Ask Why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Be Good - Positive impact. We always strive to be transparent and open in our communications, take ownership and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, orientations and backgrounds.

At Silo AI our team of 200+ AI Engineers, AI Scientists, Solutions Architects, Software Developers, and Designers collaborate closely to tackle challenging real-world problems related to AI. Now we are looking for AI Engineers to build MLOps solutions for quality ML development and scalable AI utilizations in multi-cloud environments. The work is done as part of our Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Oulu, Stockholm or Copenhagen teams.What Will You Be DoingBuilding versatile ML development and AI deployment setups (pipelines and/or platforms) and other MLOps solutions to enable production-level AI and ML in multi-cloud environments and sometimes in connection to IoT and embedded settingsWork very practically hand-on but also designing the needed architectures and workflows - enabled by Silo AI assets and learning from versatile project casesWork as part of the team with leading AI experts and use cutting edge tools to train, deploy and service advanced machine learning models Working in client projects in various different industries that typically lasts 3-6 months, but we also work in long-term projects lasting 1-2 years Contributing to Cloud AI & MLOps community and R&D work of Silo AIWhat We Are Looking For From YouYou have strong experience in software development Experience in training, versioning, deploying, monitoring and/or maintaining machine learning modelsYou have knowledge of cloud platforms and technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Azure, AWS and/or Google Cloud)You are experienced in programming with Python and can adopt other programming languages. You are familiar with some typical MLOps tools, such as KubeFlow, MLFlow, KFServing/KServe, Seldon, Airflow, Argo, Prefect or others; some DevOps tooling such as Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform scripting (or CloudFormation or similar); some machine learning frameworks, such as Tensorflow and/or PyTorch; some logging tools, such as ElasticStack, Grafana, Prometheus and/or othersYou have a track record of producing quality code and developing software with different practices (CI/CD, version control, some variety of agile development)You may have also DataOps related experience around storage (SQL, NoSQL, cloud), processing (batch, stream, ETL), managing/versioning, security, visualization and/or big dataYou are interested in working and communicating with Silo AI clients and working part of the team with Silo experts Be able to learn new skills and adapt quickly, as the problems, tools, best practices, and architectures are rapidly changing. What Silo Ai Offers To YouReal-world and production-level projects related to AI in various different industries such as retail, manufacturing, machine industry, automotive, pharma, telecom, smart devices, medical, energy & infra, logistics, healthcare, and internet services High-level & diverse tech and non-tech expertise around you as peers with our team of 200+ employees and 20+ nationalities Cloud AI & MLOps community which includes 30+ experts and a lot of information sharing and learning resources - and our other three technology areas include IoT, Embedded and Connectivity which bring their own additions to the MLOps work Learning culture with several different learning activities to support your learning such as 1-1 talent coaching with lead level experts, self-development benefit, company-wide workshops, internal research club bi-weekly basis Silo social activities like daily meditation, virtual lunches, and company-wide all-hands every Friday, company supported Silo social activities Growth company environment - in 2021 we have hired around 100 new employees and opened up a new office in Copenhagen, Denmark. In 2022 we are looking for hiring even more employees than in 2021 and opening up new countries in addition to the three current ones. Possibility to become Silo shareholderNormal benefits such as work equipment of own choice, occupational healthcare, sports & culture vouchers, internet, lunch through Wolt on Fridays, self-development budgetOUR CULTUREWhat we believe in at SiloBuild bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and seek to understand how we can best help, and always keep what we promise. AI for People defines what Silo AI stands for. We want to build a world with safe human-centric AI that frees the human mind from manual labour and empowers human creativity. We are looking experienced software developers interested in implementing production-grade AI solutions.As a Software Developer you will be working on creating solutions for our clients as well as as a part of Silo AI's internal product R&D team. You will e.g. design and develop data-heavy, secure, and reliable web-based applications and backend services for cloud and edge environments. You will design and implement tools and applications that change the way we build and run our AI solutions and how we fit them to broader software systems. You will take care of packaging, testing, deploying, and supporting the software you deliver.Examples of our current tech stack and tools consist of for example Python, Node.js, Vue.js, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Bitbucket. Read more about our cases that we have made for Infranode in automated lead generation and Philips in radiotherapy planning.Meet the teamYou will be working closely with our AI Scientists, experienced Software Developers and AI Architects while building our new products. Get to know some of your future colleagues: Lead AI Solutions Architect Niko, Senior Software Developer Kimmo and AI Scientist Luiza.What we valueStrong experience with our key technologies, including Python and preferably Vue.jsExperience in designing and building cloud-deployed web-based applications and data-heavy backend servicesInitiative, pragmatic problem solving, and great communication skillsDesire and ability to quickly acquire broad high-level intuition of AI systems and solutionsExperience in devops, AI systems and frameworks, scientific Python stack, edge deployments, and infrastructure automation is a big plusWhat Silo offers for you?As we already know, AI will be affecting almost everyone's work and everyday life. With us you have a real chance of shaping the change that AI will bring to everyone of us. You will get to choose your tools, methods, and ways of working together with the R&D team while ramping it up. The products you develop will have a key role in expanding and accelerating the use of AI in large scale real world applications. Your closest colleagues will be an AI enthusiast mix of model developers and software experts working in the AI areas of computer vision, machine learning, and natural language processing. We aim for excellence by keep learning from the market, sharing our competence and looking for a growth mindset. We will help your learning for example through our Learning Labs and Talent CoachingInterested in joining us?Send your application from the "apply" button and tell us why you are interested in the Software Developer role at Silo AI and what you are passionate about, along with relevant profiles (CV/LinkedIn/Github).

At Silo AI our team of 200+ AI Engineers, AI Scientists, Solutions Architects, Software Developers, and Designers collaborate closely to tackle challenging real-world problems related to AI. Now we are looking for AI Engineers to build MLOps solutions for quality ML development and scalable AI utilizations in multi-cloud environments. The work is done as part of our Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Oulu, Stockholm or Copenhagen teams.What Will You Be DoingBuilding versatile ML development and AI deployment setups (pipelines and/or platforms) and other MLOps solutions to enable production-level AI and ML in multi-cloud environments and sometimes in connection to IoT and embedded settingsWork very practically hand-on but also designing the needed architectures and workflows - enabled by Silo AI assets and learning from versatile project casesWork as part of the team with leading AI experts and use cutting edge tools to train, deploy and service advanced machine learning models Working in client projects in various different industries that typically lasts 3-6 months, but we also work in long-term projects lasting 1-2 years Contributing to Cloud AI & MLOps community and R&D work of Silo AIWhat We Are Looking For From YouYou have strong experience in software development Experience in training, versioning, deploying, monitoring and/or maintaining machine learning modelsYou have knowledge of cloud platforms and technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Azure, AWS and/or Google Cloud)You are experienced in programming with Python and can adopt other programming languages. You are familiar with some typical MLOps tools, such as KubeFlow, MLFlow, KFServing/KServe, Seldon, Airflow, Argo, Prefect or others; some DevOps tooling such as Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform scripting (or CloudFormation or similar); some machine learning frameworks, such as Tensorflow and/or PyTorch; some logging tools, such as ElasticStack, Grafana, Prometheus and/or othersYou have a track record of producing quality code and developing software with different practices (CI/CD, version control, some variety of agile development)You may have also DataOps related experience around storage (SQL, NoSQL, cloud), processing (batch, stream, ETL), managing/versioning, security, visualization and/or big dataYou are interested in working and communicating with Silo AI clients and working part of the team with Silo experts Be able to learn new skills and adapt quickly, as the problems, tools, best practices, and architectures are rapidly changing. What Silo Ai Offers To YouReal-world and production-level projects related to AI in various different industries such as retail, manufacturing, machine industry, automotive, pharma, telecom, smart devices, medical, energy & infra, logistics, healthcare, and internet services High-level & diverse tech and non-tech expertise around you as peers with our team of 200+ employees and 20+ nationalities Cloud AI & MLOps community which includes 30+ experts and a lot of information sharing and learning resources - and our other three technology areas include IoT, Embedded and Connectivity which bring their own additions to the MLOps work Learning culture with several different learning activities to support your learning such as 1-1 talent coaching with lead level experts, self-development benefit, company-wide workshops, internal research club bi-weekly basis Silo social activities like daily meditation, virtual lunches, and company-wide all-hands every Friday, company supported Silo social activities Growth company environment - in 2021 we have hired around 100 new employees and opened up a new office in Copenhagen, Denmark. In 2022 we are looking for hiring even more employees than in 2021 and opening up new countries in addition to the three current ones. Possibility to become Silo shareholderNormal benefits such as work equipment of own choice, occupational healthcare, sports & culture vouchers, internet, lunch through Wolt on Fridays, self-development budgetOUR CULTUREWhat we believe in at SiloBuild bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and seek to understand how we can best help, and always keep what we promise. We encourage a culture in which successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Be good - Positive impact. We strive to be transparent and open, take responsibility and ownership, and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, and backgrounds. Ask why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Keep learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and recruiting a growth mindset. For us expertise is not an achievement, it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing, and working with people who share the same hunger. WANT TO KNOW MORE?You can ask more about Silo AI as a workplace from our Talent Acquisition Lead Emmi Matvejeff, emmi.matvejeff@silo.ai

AI for People defines what Silo AI stands for. We want to build a world with safe human-centric AI that frees the human mind from manual labour and empowers human creativity. We are looking experienced software developers interested in implementing production-grade AI solutions.As a Software Developer you will be working on creating solutions for our clients as well as as a part of Silo AI's internal product R&D team. You will e.g. design and develop data-heavy, secure, and reliable web-based applications and backend services for cloud and edge environments. You will design and implement tools and applications that change the way we build and run our AI solutions and how we fit them to broader software systems. You will take care of packaging, testing, deploying, and supporting the software you deliver.Examples of our current tech stack and tools consist of for example Python, Node.js, Vue.js, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Bitbucket. Read more about our cases that we have made for Infranode in automated lead generation and Philips in radiotherapy planning.Meet the teamYou will be working closely with our AI Scientists, experienced Software Developers and AI Architects while building our new products. Get to know some of your future colleagues: Lead AI Solutions Architect Niko, Senior Software Developer Kimmo and AI Scientist Luiza.What we valueStrong experience with our key technologies, including Python and preferably Vue.jsExperience in designing and building cloud-deployed web-based applications and data-heavy backend servicesInitiative, pragmatic problem solving, and great communication skillsDesire and ability to quickly acquire broad high-level intuition of AI systems and solutionsExperience in devops, AI systems and frameworks, scientific Python stack, edge deployments, and infrastructure automation is a big plusWhat Silo offers for you?As we already know, AI will be affecting almost everyone's work and everyday life. With us you have a real chance of shaping the change that AI will bring to everyone of us. You will get to choose your tools, methods, and ways of working together with the R&D team while ramping it up. The products you develop will have a key role in expanding and accelerating the use of AI in large scale real world applications. Your closest colleagues will be an AI enthusiast mix of model developers and software experts working in the AI areas of computer vision, machine learning, and natural language processing. We aim for excellence by keep learning from the market, sharing our competence and looking for a growth mindset. We will help your learning for example through our Learning Labs and Talent CoachingInterested in joining us?Send your application from the "apply" button and tell us why you are interested in the Software Developer role at Silo AI and what you are passionate about, along with relevant profiles (CV/LinkedIn/Github).

AI Scientists are expected to build innovative AI solutions powered by, and powering, Large Language Models (LLMs) that together with engineers and software developers can be deployed in our products serving our clients.What will you be doingAs an AI Scientist in Large Language Models, you'll work in a top tier team of AI experts, creating next-generation methods for creating safe, reliable and robust AI models. Investigate and implement methods to ensure model qualityAdvance exploratory research projects in machine learning and related fields. Requirements:PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field. 5+ years of experience in Artificial Intelligence and Machine LearningStrong expertise and publication record in Natural Language Processing and large language models or Reinforcement Learning. At Silo AI our team of 200+ AI Engineers, AI Scientists, Solutions Architects, Software Developers, and Designers collaborate closely to tackle challenging real-world problems related to AI. Now we are looking for AI Engineers to build MLOps solutions for quality ML development and scalable AI utilizations in multi-cloud environments. The work is done as part of our Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Oulu, Stockholm or Copenhagen teams.What Will You Be DoingBuilding versatile ML development and AI deployment setups (pipelines and/or platforms) and other MLOps solutions to enable production-level AI and ML in multi-cloud environments and sometimes in connection to IoT and embedded settingsWork very practically hand-on but also designing the needed architectures and workflows - enabled by Silo AI assets and learning from versatile project casesWork as part of the team with leading AI experts and use cutting edge tools to train, deploy and service advanced machine learning models Working in client projects in various different industries that typically lasts 3-6 months, but we also work in long-term projects lasting 1-2 years Contributing to Cloud AI & MLOps community and R&D work of Silo AIWhat We Are Looking For From YouYou have strong experience in software development Experience in training, versioning, deploying, monitoring and/or maintaining machine learning modelsYou have knowledge of cloud platforms and technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Azure, AWS and/or Google Cloud)You are experienced in programming with Python and can adopt other programming languages. You are familiar with some typical MLOps tools, such as KubeFlow, MLFlow, KFServing/KServe, Seldon, Airflow, Argo, Prefect or others; some DevOps tooling such as Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform scripting (or CloudFormation or similar); some machine learning frameworks, such as Tensorflow and/or PyTorch; some logging tools, such as ElasticStack, Grafana, Prometheus and/or othersYou have a track record of producing quality code and developing software with different practices (CI/CD, version control, some variety of agile development)You may have also DataOps related experience around storage (SQL, NoSQL, cloud), processing (batch, stream, ETL), managing/versioning, security, visualization and/or big dataYou are interested in working and communicating with Silo AI clients and working part of the team with Silo experts Be able to learn new skills and adapt quickly, as the problems, tools, best practices, and architectures are rapidly changing. What Silo Ai Offers To YouReal-world and production-level projects related to AI in various different industries such as retail, manufacturing, machine industry, automotive, pharma, telecom, smart devices, medical, energy & infra, logistics, healthcare, and internet services High-level & diverse tech and non-tech expertise around you as peers with our team of 200+ employees and 20+ nationalities Cloud AI & MLOps community which includes 30+ experts and a lot of information sharing and learning resources - and our other three technology areas include IoT, Embedded and Connectivity which bring their own additions to the MLOps work Learning culture with several different learning activities to support your learning such as 1-1 talent coaching with lead level experts, self-development benefit, company-wide workshops, internal research club bi-weekly basis Silo social activities like daily meditation, virtual lunches, and company-wide all-hands every Friday, company supported Silo social activities Growth company environment - in 2021 we have hired around 100 new employees and opened up a new office in Copenhagen, Denmark. In 2022 we are looking for hiring even more employees than in 2021 and opening up new countries in addition to the three current ones. Possibility to become Silo shareholderNormal benefits such as work equipment of own choice, occupational healthcare, sports & culture vouchers, internet, lunch through Wolt on Fridays, self-development budgetOUR CULTUREWhat we believe in at SiloBuild bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and seek to understand how we can best help, and always keep what we promise. We encourage a culture in which successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Be good - Positive impact. We strive to be transparent and open, take responsibility and ownership, and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, and backgrounds. Ask why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Keep learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and recruiting a growth mindset. For us expertise is not an achievement, it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing, and working with people who share the same hunger. WANT TO KNOW MORE?You can ask more about Silo AI as a workplace from our Talent Acquisition Lead Emmi Matvejeff, emmi.matvejeff@silo.ai

AI for People defines what Silo AI stands for. We want to build a world with safe human-centric AI that frees the human mind from manual labour and empowers human creativity. We are looking experienced software developers interested in implementing production-grade AI solutions.As a Software Developer you will be working on creating solutions for our clients as well as as a part of Silo AI's internal product R&D team. You will e.g. design and develop data-heavy, secure, and reliable web-based applications and backend services for cloud and edge environments. You will design and implement tools and applications that change the way we build and run our AI solutions and how we fit them to broader software systems. You will take care of packaging, testing, deploying, and supporting the software you deliver.Examples of our current tech stack and tools consist of for example Python, Node.js, Vue.js, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Bitbucket. Read more about our cases that we have made for Infranode in automated lead generation and Philips in radiotherapy planning.Meet the teamYou will be working closely with our AI Scientists, experienced Software Developers and AI Architects while building our new products. Get to know some of your future colleagues: Lead AI Solutions Architect Niko, Senior Software Developer Kimmo and AI Scientist Luiza.What we valueStrong experience with our key technologies, including Python and preferably Vue.jsExperience in designing and building cloud-deployed web-based applications and data-heavy backend servicesInitiative, pragmatic problem solving, and great communication skillsDesire and ability to quickly acquire broad high-level intuition of AI systems and solutionsExperience in devops, AI systems and frameworks, scientific Python stack, edge deployments, and infrastructure automation is a big plusWhat Silo offers for you?As we already know, AI will be affecting almost everyone's work and everyday life. With us you have a real chance of shaping the change that AI will bring to everyone of us. You will get to choose your tools, methods, and ways of working together with the R&D team while ramping it up. The products you develop will have a key role in expanding and accelerating the use of AI in large scale real world applications. Your closest colleagues will be an AI enthusiast mix of model developers and software experts working in the AI areas of computer vision, machine learning, and natural language processing. We aim for excellence by keep learning from the market, sharing our competence and looking for a growth mindset. We will help your learning for example through our Learning Labs and Talent CoachingInterested in joining us?Send your application from the "apply" button and tell us why you are interested in the Software Developer role at Silo AI and what you are passionate about, along with relevant profiles (CV/LinkedIn/Github).

You may choose to work from our offices in Helsinki, Turku, Stockholm or Oulu, whichever suits you best.Get to know your future colleagues AI Scientist Emil and AI Scientist Luiza.AI Scientists are expected to have strong publications or projects showing clear evidence of high-quality research and innovation in fields directly related to AI and proven experience and ability to implement high-performance AI solutions:Analyze data to discover patterns, find opportunities, and develop and apply innovative algorithms. Validate new or improved models via statistically relevant experiments. Work closely with AI engineers to build scalable prototypes for testing, and integrate successful models and algorithms in production systems. Support in identifying opportunities in creating customer value with AI. Advance exploratory research projects in machine learning and related fields to create highly innovative customer experiences. Read more about our projects with Finnair in flight delay prediction, with Ramboll in water quality predictions and with Awake.AI in developing smart ports and smart vessels.Our cultureWhat we believe in at SiloBuild Bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and always seek to understand how we can best help them, and make sure that we keep what we promise. We encourage a culture where successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Keep Learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and attracting talent with a growth mindset. We believe that expertise is not an achievement - it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing and working with people who share the same hunger. Ask Why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Be Good - Positive impact. We always strive to be transparent and open in our communications, take ownership and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, orientations and backgrounds.

Investigate and implement methods to ensure model qualityAdvance exploratory research projects in machine learning and related fields. At Silo AI our team of 200+ AI Engineers, AI Scientists, Solutions Architects, Software Developers, and Designers collaborate closely to tackle challenging real-world problems related to AI. Now we are looking for AI Engineers to build MLOps solutions for quality ML development and scalable AI utilizations in multi-cloud environments. The work is done as part of our Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Oulu, Stockholm or Copenhagen teams.What Will You Be DoingBuilding versatile ML development and AI deployment setups (pipelines and/or platforms) and other MLOps solutions to enable production-level AI and ML in multi-cloud environments and sometimes in connection to IoT and embedded settingsWork very practically hand-on but also designing the needed architectures and workflows - enabled by Silo AI assets and learning from versatile project casesWork as part of the team with leading AI experts and use cutting edge tools to train, deploy and service advanced machine learning models Working in client projects in various different industries that typically lasts 3-6 months, but we also work in long-term projects lasting 1-2 years Contributing to Cloud AI & MLOps community and R&D work of Silo AIWhat We Are Looking For From YouYou have strong experience in software development Experience in training, versioning, deploying, monitoring and/or maintaining machine learning modelsYou have knowledge of cloud platforms and technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Azure, AWS and/or Google Cloud)You are experienced in programming with Python and can adopt other programming languages. You are familiar with some typical MLOps tools, such as KubeFlow, MLFlow, KFServing/KServe, Seldon, Airflow, Argo, Prefect or others; some DevOps tooling such as Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform scripting (or CloudFormation or similar); some machine learning frameworks, such as Tensorflow and/or PyTorch; some logging tools, such as ElasticStack, Grafana, Prometheus and/or othersYou have a track record of producing quality code and developing software with different practices (CI/CD, version control, some variety of agile development)You may have also DataOps related experience around storage (SQL, NoSQL, cloud), processing (batch, stream, ETL), managing/versioning, security, visualization and/or big dataYou are interested in working and communicating with Silo AI clients and working part of the team with Silo experts Be able to learn new skills and adapt quickly, as the problems, tools, best practices, and architectures are rapidly changing. What Silo Ai Offers To YouReal-world and production-level projects related to AI in various different industries such as retail, manufacturing, machine industry, automotive, pharma, telecom, smart devices, medical, energy & infra, logistics, healthcare, and internet services High-level & diverse tech and non-tech expertise around you as peers with our team of 200+ employees and 20+ nationalities Cloud AI & MLOps community which includes 30+ experts and a lot of information sharing and learning resources - and our other three technology areas include IoT, Embedded and Connectivity which bring their own additions to the MLOps work Learning culture with several different learning activities to support your learning such as 1-1 talent coaching with lead level experts, self-development benefit, company-wide workshops, internal research club bi-weekly basis Silo social activities like daily meditation, virtual lunches, and company-wide all-hands every Friday, company supported Silo social activities Growth company environment - in 2021 we have hired around 100 new employees and opened up a new office in Copenhagen, Denmark. In 2022 we are looking for hiring even more employees than in 2021 and opening up new countries in addition to the three current ones. Possibility to become Silo shareholderNormal benefits such as work equipment of own choice, occupational healthcare, sports & culture vouchers, internet, lunch through Wolt on Fridays, self-development budgetOUR CULTUREWhat we believe in at SiloBuild bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and seek to understand how we can best help, and always keep what we promise. We encourage a culture in which successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Be good - Positive impact. We strive to be transparent and open, take responsibility and ownership, and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, and backgrounds. Ask why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Keep learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and recruiting a growth mindset. For us expertise is not an achievement, it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing, and working with people who share the same hunger. WANT TO KNOW MORE?You can ask more about Silo AI as a workplace from our Talent Acquisition Lead Emmi Matvejeff, emmi.matvejeff@silo.ai

AI for People defines what Silo AI stands for. We want to build a world with safe human-centric AI that frees the human mind from manual labour and empowers human creativity. We are looking experienced software developers interested in implementing production-grade AI solutions.As a Software Developer you will be working on creating solutions for our clients as well as as a part of Silo AI's internal product R&D team. You will e.g. design and develop data-heavy, secure, and reliable web-based applications and backend services for cloud and edge environments. You will design and implement tools and applications that change the way we build and run our AI solutions and how we fit them to broader software systems. You will take care of packaging, testing, deploying, and supporting the software you deliver.Examples of our current tech stack and tools consist of for example Python, Node.js, Vue.js, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Bitbucket. Read more about our cases that we have made for Infranode in automated lead generation and Philips in radiotherapy planning.Meet the teamYou will be working closely with our AI Scientists, experienced Software Developers and AI Architects while building our new products. Get to know some of your future colleagues: Lead AI Solutions Architect Niko, Senior Software Developer Kimmo and AI Scientist Luiza.What we valueStrong experience with our key technologies, including Python and preferably Vue.jsExperience in designing and building cloud-deployed web-based applications and data-heavy backend servicesInitiative, pragmatic problem solving, and great communication skillsDesire and ability to quickly acquire broad high-level intuition of AI systems and solutionsExperience in devops, AI systems and frameworks, scientific Python stack, edge deployments, and infrastructure automation is a big plusWhat Silo offers for you?As we already know, AI will be affecting almost everyone's work and everyday life. With us you have a real chance of shaping the change that AI will bring to everyone of us. You will get to choose your tools, methods, and ways of working together with the R&D team while ramping it up. The products you develop will have a key role in expanding and accelerating the use of AI in large scale real world applications. Your closest colleagues will be an AI enthusiast mix of model developers and software experts working in the AI areas of computer vision, machine learning, and natural language processing. We aim for excellence by keep learning from the market, sharing our competence and looking for a growth mindset. We will help your learning for example through our Learning Labs and Talent CoachingInterested in joining us?Send your application from the "apply" button and tell us why you are interested in the Software Developer role at Silo AI and what you are passionate about, along with relevant profiles (CV/LinkedIn/Github).

Requirements:PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field. 5+ years of experience in Artificial Intelligence and Machine LearningStrong expertise and publication record in Natural Language Processing and large language models or Reinforcement Learning. Proficiency in Python, SQL, and PyTorchWorking proficiency in EnglishOur cultureWhat we believe in at Silo AIBuild Bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and always seek to understand how we can best help them, and make sure that we keep what we promise. We encourage a culture where successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Keep Learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and attracting talent with a growth mindset. We believe that expertise is not an achievement - it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing and working with people who share the same hunger. Ask Why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Be Good - Positive impact. We always strive to be transparent and open in our communications, take ownership and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, orientations and

At Silo AI our team of 200+ AI Engineers, AI Scientists, Solutions Architects, Software Developers, and Designers collaborate closely to tackle challenging real-world problems related to AI. Now we are looking for AI Engineers to build MLOps solutions for quality ML development and scalable AI utilizations in multi-cloud environments. The work is done as part of our Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Oulu, Stockholm or Copenhagen teams.What Will You Be DoingBuilding versatile ML development and AI deployment setups (pipelines and/or platforms) and other MLOps solutions to enable production-level AI and ML in multi-cloud environments and sometimes in connection to IoT and embedded settingsWork very practically hand-on but also designing the needed architectures and workflows - enabled by Silo AI assets and learning from versatile project casesWork as part of the team with leading AI experts and use cutting edge tools to train, deploy and service advanced machine learning models Working in client projects in various different industries that typically lasts 3-6 months, but we also work in long-term projects lasting 1-2 years Contributing to Cloud AI & MLOps community and R&D work of Silo AIWhat We Are Looking For From YouYou have strong experience in software development Experience in training, versioning, deploying, monitoring and/or maintaining machine learning modelsYou have knowledge of cloud platforms and technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Azure, AWS and/or Google Cloud)You are experienced in programming with Python and can adopt other programming languages. You are familiar with some typical MLOps tools, such as KubeFlow, MLFlow, KFServing/KServe, Seldon, Airflow, Argo, Prefect or others; some DevOps tooling such as Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform scripting (or CloudFormation or similar); some machine learning frameworks, such as Tensorflow and/or PyTorch; some logging tools, such as ElasticStack, Grafana, Prometheus and/or othersYou have a track record of producing quality code and developing software with different practices (CI/CD, version control, some variety of agile development)You may have also DataOps related experience around storage (SQL, NoSQL, cloud), processing (batch, stream, ETL), managing/versioning, security, visualization and/or big dataYou are interested in working and communicating with Silo AI clients and working part of the team with Silo experts Be able to learn new skills and adapt quickly, as the problems, tools, best practices, and architectures are rapidly changing. What Silo Ai Offers To YouReal-world and production-level projects related to AI in various different industries such as retail, manufacturing, machine industry, automotive, pharma, telecom, smart devices, medical, energy & infra, logistics, healthcare, and internet services High-level & diverse tech and non-tech expertise around you as peers with our team of 200+ employees and 20+ nationalities Cloud AI & MLOps community which includes 30+ experts and a lot of information sharing and learning resources - and our other three technology areas include IoT, Embedded and Connectivity which bring their own additions to the MLOps work Learning culture with several different learning activities to support your learning such as 1-1 talent coaching with lead level experts, self-development benefit, company-wide workshops, internal research club bi-weekly basis Silo social activities like daily meditation, virtual lunches, and company-wide all-hands every Friday, company supported Silo social activities Growth company environment - in 2021 we have hired around 100 new employees and opened up a new office in Copenhagen, Denmark. In 2022 we are looking for hiring even more employees than in 2021 and opening up new countries in addition to the three current ones. Possibility to become Silo shareholderNormal benefits such as work equipment of own choice, occupational healthcare, sports & culture vouchers, internet, lunch through Wolt on Fridays, self-development budgetOUR CULTUREWhat we believe in at SiloBuild bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and seek to understand how we can best help, and always keep what we promise. We encourage a culture in which successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Be good - Positive impact. We strive to be transparent and open, take responsibility and ownership, and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, and backgrounds. Ask why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Keep learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and recruiting a growth mindset. For us expertise is not an achievement, it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing, and working with people who share the same hunger. WANT TO KNOW MORE?You can ask more about Silo AI as a workplace from our Talent Acquisition Lead Emmi Matvejeff, emmi.matvejeff@silo.ai
